Description.Text: The place to be if you want to be well placed! BEST WESTERN Reigate Manor Hotel is just eight miles from Gatwick Airport and 20 miles from Heathrow, so it's ideal for holidaymakers on their way to foreign climbs as well as business folks who need comfort and convenience. We're also just one mile from junction eight of the M25 with easy access to the M23 too, so guests can easily escape to the country while they're with us. Chessington, Chartwell and Thorpe Park are all easy to reach! The hotel offers 130 car parking spaces free of charge, 50 non-smoking bedrooms all with a writing desk (and satellite television for when your work is done)! There are five dedicated meeting/conference rooms for productive breaks, with the largest seating 200 delegates. All rooms are equipped and furnished to the highest standard and are suitable for all types of set up...which we'll be happy to help you with!
Perched high on Reigate Hill with commanding views. The hotel is on the A217 and is just a stones throw from Junction 8 of the M25.
All 39 Bedrooms are en suite offering the following facilities, Satellite television, Telephones with Internet access, Hairdryers, Irons and Tea & coffee facilities.
Friths Restaurant, on premises, Full Service, International, open for: breakfast, lunch, dinner open 12:30 p.m. to 2:00 p.m. and 7:00 p.m. to 9:30 p.m. Monday to Friday, also open to non-residents.
